Posts.Content: Amandaglisson wrote: hi my name is Amanda. I am a single mom of two. in 2009 I had a breast biopsy done. which left me half of a Left breast.and I just tested positive for the genetic gene. I cannot get insurance and my doctor recommended me removing my breast and getting implants. I do not make enough money and my doctor told me that's some doctors would be able to possibly help me. I could really use some advice on where to go if you're unable . I'm in the lot of pain with both breast . thank you so much for your time Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: help Amandaglisson Moderators
